definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

sentences.english: Many tarantulas have a dense covering of stinging hairs on the abdomen.
sentences.chinese: 許多狼蛛腹部覆蓋着密集的刺狀茸毛。

sentences.english: There is some tiny fuzz on the newly emerged tender sprouts.
sentences.chinese: 剛長出來的嫩芽上有些細小的茸毛。

sentences.english: The experience and measures to improve lousiness gradation for famous brands of raw silk are presented.
sentences.chinese: 並介紹了提高名牌生絲茸毛分級度的經驗和措施。

sentences.english: The hairs on a plant are fine like threads.
sentences.chinese: 植物的茸毛像針一樣細。

sentences.english: The numbers of leaf pubescences and hull pubescences were all mainly governed by major genes.
sentences.chinese: 葉片茸毛數和穀殼稃毛數都以主基因遺傳爲主。

definition: fur/down (soft fur)/villi capillary (in the small intestine)
venation (pattern of veins on a leaf)
